name: Wanam Xposed Backup File
summary: Learn about .WX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The Wanama Xposed application enables you to customize a large amount of options on your Samsung device. You can change the appearance of the clock, battery, and date displays, and the notification bar. You can also add other capabilities such as recovery and download mode options and the ability to kill apps with a long-press of the volume down button.
